text: Richard Steven Horvitz (born July 29, 1966) is an American voice actor and comedian. He voiced an eponymous alien in Invader Zim, Billy in The Grim Adventures of Billy & Mandy, Jonny 2x4 in Ed, Edd n Eddy, Kaos in Skylanders and Daggett in The Angry Beavers, and Moxxie Knolastname in Helluva Boss. ==Filmography== * How the Grinch Stole Christmas (2000) * Invader Zim (2001-2006) * Osmosis Jones (2001) * Grim & Evil (2001-2003) * The Grim Adventures of Billy & Mandy (2003-2008) * Ed, Edd n Eddy (1999-2009) * Destroy All Humans! (2005 video game) * Billy & Mandy's Big Boogey Adventure (2007) * Billy & Mandy: Wrath of the Spider Queen (2007) * Destroy All Humans! (2020 video game) * Helluva Boss (2019-Present) ==Other websites== * Category:1966 births Category:American video game actors Category:American voice actors Category:Jewish American actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Living people
title: Richard Steven Horvitz
